alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Campbell; City of Lynchburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia and south central Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, in central Virginia, Amherst, Campbell and City of Lynchburg. In south central Virginia, Bedford. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 923 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Chestnut Branch, Elk Creek, Big Otter River, Dreaming Creek, Buttom Creek, Burton Creek, Carters Creek, Blackwater Creek and Buffalo Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lynchburg... Forest... Rustburg... Bocock... Timberlake... Madison Heights... Boonsboro... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Amherst; Bedford; Campbell; City of Lynchburg
